content: ***spend $25 or more in my ravelry shop in one transaction and you will automatically receive 25% off your entire purchase *** sometimes you need to just wind up that recent yarn purchase and knit for the pure joy if it to remember why you knit the combination of a simple stitch pattern the eyelet pattern from therapy 1 and garter stitch in this shawl make it ideal for highly variegated yarns but it will be equally beautiful in any solid color you love the pattern is easily memorized and you don t need to count stitches it was designed with heavier-weight yarns dk and worsted in mind but could be adapted for different weights as written and knit in a dk weight yarn the shawl measures 88 across by 20 deep using a lighter-weight yarn will give you a smaller shawl or you can add row for a larger one - either between the patterned row or by adding another segment at the end if you want a smaller shawl it s simple to omit row or segments if you are looking for some lovely variegated yarns in dk/light worsted check out sunshine yarns merino dk 3 check for updates here 4 and the babette colorways of yowza 5 kaweah 6 and kunlun 7 **skills required ** increasing decreasing yarn overs pattern chat thread is here 2 *sample knit in mineville wool project merino dk single in micah * 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/therapy 2 http //www ravelry com/discuss/lauras-workshop/topics/3669336 3 http //www sunshineyarns com/category php category_id=85 4 http //www ravelry com/discuss/sunshine-yarnies/3525837 5 https //www missbabs com/collections/yowza/dye-style-babette 6 https //www missbabs com/collections/kaweah/dye-style-babette 7 https //www missbabs com/collections/kunlun/dye-style-babette
